statements: SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, resolution FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth > 16;
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, color_depth FROM image_metadata WHERE resolution LIKE '%1920x1080%';
SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth BETWEEN 16 AND 32;
SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth > 16 ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, image_name, resolution FROM image_metadata WHERE resolution LIKE '1920x1080%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT image_name, color_depth FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, image_name FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth = 24 AND resolution LIKE '%4k%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE resolution LIKE '%720p%' AND color_depth < 16 ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM image_metadata;
SELECT image_id, resolution, color_depth FROM image_metadata ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth > 16;
SELECT * FROM image_tags WHERE tag_name = 'nature';
SELECT image_id, resolution, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE resolution LIKE 'HD%';
SELECT * FROM image_metadata ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT image_id, resolution, color_depth FROM image_metadata WHERE color_depth > 16
SELECT image_id, resolution, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT image_id, tag_name FROM image_tags INNER JOIN image_metadata ON image_tags.image_id = image_metadata.image_id WHERE tag_name = 'nature'
SELECT AVG(color_depth), MAX(color_depth), MIN(color_depth) FROM image_metadata
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT resolution, color_depth FROM ImageMetadata WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM ImageTags WHERE tag_id > 5 ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, tag_id FROM ImageTagMapping WHERE image_id = 3 OR tag_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata ORDER BY capture_date ASC, color_depth DESC;
SELECT image_id, resolution, color_depth, capture_date FROM ImageMetadata;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE color_depth > 32 ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) as tag_count FROM ImageTags JOIN ImageTagMapping ON ImageTags.tag_id = ImageTagMapping.tag_id GROUP BY tag_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
SELECT image_id, resolution, color_depth, capture_date FROM ImageMetadata WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM ImageMetadata WHERE color_depth = 24 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT file_name, resolution FROM images WHERE color_depth > 16;
SELECT image_id, file_name, capture_date FROM images ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, resolution, color_depth FROM images WHERE color_depth = 8 AND resolution LIKE '%x720';
SELECT image_id, file_name, tag_name FROM images JOIN image_tags ON images.image_id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE resolution LIKE '%1080p' ORDER BY capture_date DESC, color_depth ASC;
SELECT image_id, file_name, resolution FROM images INNER JOIN image_tags ON images.image_id = image_tags.image_id WHERE tag_name = 'nature' ORDER BY capture_date DESC;

SELECT images.file_name, image_categories.category_name FROM images INNER JOIN image_category_mapping ON images.image_id = image_category_mapping.image_id INNER JOIN image_categories ON image_categories.category_id = image_category_mapping.category_id ORDER BY image_categories.category_name ASC, images.capture_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, file_name, resolution FROM images WHERE color_depth > 16 AND capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, file_name, resolution, color_depth FROM images WHERE color_depth BETWEEN 8 AND 32 ORDER BY color_depth ASC, capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Image_Metadata;
SELECT image_id, resolution FROM Image_Metadata WHERE resolution='HD';
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM Image_Metadata ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Image_Tags WHERE tag_name='Nature';
SELECT image_id, location_name FROM Image_Locations WHERE location_name='Beach';
SELECT * FROM Image_Metadata WHERE capture_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT image_id, resolution, color_depth FROM Image_Metadata WHERE color_depth > 8
SELECT * FROM Image_Metadata JOIN Image_Tags ON Image_Metadata.image_id = Image_Tags.tag_id
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(*) FROM Image_Categories c JOIN Image_Metadata m ON c.category_id = m.image_id GROUP BY c.category_name
SELECT l.location_name, COUNT(*) FROM Image_Locations l JOIN Image_Metadata m ON l.location_id = m.image_id GROUP BY l.location_name
